title: Is IB a good board or not? - Quora

response.answer_text: IB is very good. Please refer What is the IB board like? / How is the IB board? IB decoded / http://www.ibo.org/benefits/benefits-for-students/ If you are in India, https://www.mindler.com/blog/can-ib-board-students-apply-to-indian-universities/
